title: Unspecified error on clean install

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Trying to install league of legends for the first time on this computer. I've tried deleting and reinstalling several times. 
This screenshot was taken during an attempt that stayed at 1% until it jumped up to about 30-40% after the message was displayed. Tried it agian just now and it jumped to 58% before displaying the error.
I'm on 64 bit windows 10.

Edit: Also unrelated and relatively minor, but at some point this account has been compromised, and the guy who was using it to post on the forum tagged his posts as "unversable" as recent as 11 months ago.  I did a quick search on the forums for his name to make an official report on him but the only other result was him tagging another post from another account: "iAteHerCookie"

replies.body:
it's just that your Client isn't able to connect to the Server to get the data to download the game. I got a fix here for ya if you run through all the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). If it continues after that make sure to hit me back up and i'll dive into this a bit deeper. 

As for the Seond part, it may be best just to report the account on the boards.
